name: generator-jhipster-nav-element
description: A generator to scaffold a new page (and the corresponding navigation menu) in a JHipster project.

scripts.release: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.preversion: npm i && npm prune && npm test
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
